name: @thxmxx/findmy.js
description: A JavaScript package for interacting with Apple's FindMy service. It handles iCloud authentication (SRP, 2FA), generates FindMy-compatible keys, and fetches/decrypts device location reports. This tool enables users to programmatically access and manage FindMy functionalities, providing insights into device tracking and security.

scripts.test: echo "Error: no test specified yet" && exit 0

author: thxmxx
